config_parentTabOperationBehaviorMode_no.message:
Whether you configured this section, there are some permanently consistent behaviors in the sidebar;
･ Close a parent tab with Collapsed Tree: Close Entire Tree
･ Move a parent tab with Collapsed Tree: Move Entire Tree
･ Move a parent tab with Expanded Tree: Behave according to the section "Drag and Drop"

config_requestPermissions_tabHide.message: 允許隱藏 / 顯示個別分頁(※為了確保真的獲得操作權限，在測試前務必取消後重新勾選此項)

config_requestPermissions_fallbackToTool.message: 點擊「Tree Style Tab」的工具列按鈕
由於 Firefox 的問題，不能由此頁頁要求權限，點擊工具列上的「Tree Style Tab」按鈕以給予權限。

tabContextMenu_sendTabsToDevice_label_mu.message: 傳送 %S 個分頁至裝置 (&N)
